original_name: The Jo. B & G. Raff Show
plot: Jo B. and G. Raff are hosts of their very own TV show. Each day, just as their show is about to start, Jo B. realizes G. Raff is missing and Jo B. must go on adventure to find him and bring him back.
plot_en: Jo B. and G. Raff are hosts of their very own TV show. Each day, just as their show is about to start, Jo B. realizes G. Raff is missing and Jo B. must go on adventure to find him and bring him back.
plot_es: Jo B. and G. Raff are hosts of their very own TV show. Each day, just as their show is about to start, Jo B. realizes G. Raff is missing and Jo B. must go on adventure to find him and bring him back.
title: The Jo. B & G. Raff Show
